subject: CASHIER CHECK OF $3.5MILLIONS
body:
CASHIER CHECK OF $3.5MILLIONS DOLLARS.
I am Miss.Jona Edward. The daughter to the cancer woman (c) my
precious mom may her soul rest in perfect peace. My mother contacted
you some time ago in respect to the funds transfer of her late husband
Morris Edward, to help her take care of me Jona Edward.
Before my mother passed a way, she issued a cashier check to you for
your help initially although you backed out thinking that the funds
transfer was illegal.
Well, everything was legal and legit and went well through the
assistance of a Japanese business Man whoâ€™s is name is Mr. Haruki
Kintarou, the funds transfer was successful through him.
I am now with a new family in Kasugai Japan and am very happy again in
LIFE. Because the new family I am staying with take me as they only
daughter but being an orphan is so challenging but am happy.
In a way to appreciate her kind gesture, she dropped a cashier check
of ( Three million five hundred thousand USD ($3,500,000.00) before
her death in your name and instructed her personal Rev Father who was
praying for us when she is alive. Rev.Anthony Breton to make sure you
receive the total amount without any problem. This is her little way
of saying thank you for your initial help.
Contact REV.Anthony Breton WITH YOUR FULL INFORMATION
Full Name:....
Direct contact number:....
And your full delivery address:....
Contact Name: REV.ANTHONY BRETON. Email Address (
comm92253@gmail.com
}
Regards,
Miss. Jona Edward.

subject: Re: CASHIER CHECK OF $3.5MILLIONS
body:
Hello Miss Jona Edward,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about the passing of your mother, may her soul rest in peace. It's good to know that you have found a new family in Kasugai, Japan and that you are happy again.

I appreciate your mother's kind gesture of leaving a cashier check of Three million five hundred thousand USD in my name. However, I must admit that I am a bit skeptical about this situation. Can you please provide me with more details about how I can claim the funds? Is there any documentation or process that needs to be followed?

Best wishes,
Michelle

subject: Re: CASHIER CHECK OF $3.5MILLIONS
body:
Hello Beneficiary Michelle,

First of all, I want you to know that I am praying for you and wishing
you God love and blessing of God in abundant in Jesus name Amen, And
believe me that God almighty is ready to help you for you to receive
your Approval check.

In respect of your check ( Three million five hundred thousand USD
($3,500,000.00) deposited on your behalf by Mrs Edward, This is to
inform you that i have made verification on how to get this check (
Three million five hundred thousand USD ($3,500,000.00) successful
sent to your doorstep and i have reach successful agreement with Post
Office to get your check post direct to your home address and the Post
Office told me that it will cost you only $100 to receive your check (
Three million five hundred thousand USD ($3,500,000.00) direct to your
home address so to faster everything to get your check to you.

You are advice to send this required $100 today by Western Union or
RIA or WorldRemit but if you can't send by Western Union or RIA or
WorldRemit then you can send it by iTunes card or Steam Wallet card
and scratch the card and get back to me with picture copy of the card
to finalize everything and get your check post to your address
immediately without any delay because this $100 is one time fee and no
more any extra charge again after this one time $100 only.

Below is the information for you to send this one time $100 by Western
Union or RIA or WorldRemit.

Receiver name John Oloh
Country       Benin Republic
City      Cotonou
Question   Honest
Answer      Trust
Mtcn..............?

But if you can't send by Western Union or RIA or WorldRemit then you
can send it by iTunes card or Steam Wallet card and scratch the card
and get back to me with picture copy of the card to finalize
everything and get your check post to your address immediately without
any delay because this $100 is one time fee and no more any extra
charge again after this one time $100 only.

I am waiting to hear from you once you make the payment by either
Western Union or RIA or WorldRemit by Steam card or iTunes card.

Best Regard
Rev.Anthony Breton
I am praying for you and wishing you God love and blessing of God in
abundant in Jesus name Amen!

subject: Re: CASHIER CHECK OF $3.5MILLIONS
body:
Hello Breton,

Thank you for reaching out to me and for your prayers. I appreciate your kind words. I'm interested in learning more about this opportunity to receive my approval check. Can you please provide me with some additional details?

1. Who is Mrs. Edward and how did she deposit the check on my behalf?
2. How exactly will the Post Office deliver the check to my doorstep? Is there a tracking number or any other information I should be aware of?
3. You mentioned that there is a cost associated with receiving the check. Could you please explain why there is a fee and what it covers?
4. If I choose to send the payment by card or Steam Wallet card, how would that work? Are there specific instructions I need to follow?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more information.

Best wishes,
Michelle
